snippet: Kent Tritle directed the first of two concerts in the revived Great Music in a Great Space series at the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by the choir at the Cathedral Church of St John the Divine, conducted by Kent Tritle, as part of the Great Music in a Great Space series.
lead_paragraph: Kent Tritle directed the first of two concerts in the revived Great Music in a Great Space series at the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine.

headline.seo: Kent Tritle Directs New Music Series at St. John the Divine
headline.main: Lifting Voices and Ambitions in a Soaring Sacred Space
headline.print_headline: Lifting Voices and Ambitions In a Soaring Sacred Space
